displayName: Restrict non-admin users from creating tenants
description: Non-admin users should not be able to create new Azure AD tenants. This reduces the risk of shadow IT and unmonitored environments.
rationale: Restricting tenant creation to admins only helps prevent unauthorized or accidental creation of new tenants, which can lead to data sprawl and security risks.
impact: Non-admin users will not be able to create new tenants. Only administrators can perform this action.

remediation.text:
To remediate using the UI:
1. Navigate to Microsoft Entra admin center https://entra.microsoft.com/.
2. Go to Tenant settings.
3. Set 'Restrict non-admin users from creating tenants' to Yes.
4. Save the changes.

status.message: Non-admin users are allowed to create tenants.

notes: This control is equivalent to 5.1.2.3 in CIS 5.0.0.
